title: Herbal Remedies
cleaned_text: Plants have been used forever in treating many ailments by supporting various organs and systems in the body. As part of our practice, we look at the whole person and, if appropriate, may recommend some herbal remedies as part of your personalized health plan. Dr. Norris has studied herbal medicine with [Matthew Wood](https://www.matthewwoodherbs.com/Mattwood.html) and [Deb Soule](https://www.avenabotanicals.com/pages/deb-soule). Give us a call today at [(207) 772-6411](tel:+12077726411). Learn what Dr. Norris can do for you or your loved ones.
